en.title: FusionExcel Making First Step In Japan!
en.content:
REPORT BY PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR AND PHILIPPINES COUNTRY LICENSEE JEREMY LOOI. 

A team comprising of Jeremy Looi supported by two brilliant and diligent interpreters Benny Tutor and Ardie Salazar, joined this huge annual event "Design Accent Expo" recently in Tokyo, Japan. With over 200,000 visitors trooping through hundreds of exhibitors booths, FE's booth again became one of the center of attraction.

As expected, many people were stunned and amazed at how effective FE's Quantum Science products are. Alternative medicine is fast gaining ground among the health conscious Japanese. Because of this many Quantum Pendants, Quantum Flasks and Quantum Bracelets were sold at the Expo. The people here believe that health benefits such as enhanced circulation, immune and endocrine systems, ability to destroy viruses and bacteria, increases in energy, etc. can help them overcome the demands of their work and busy lives.

 

" A journey of ten thousand miles begins with the first step" and FE has made this first step into Japan, the strongest economy in Asia.

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
